pages.text: O-Camels are exclusive to 1.20.1(+) versions. They drop meat, leather, and bones, and can be saddled and ridden, along with carpeted. Camels are far faster than horses on sand, and can be right-clicked with a bucket every 5 minutes~ for water. Camels are also immune to cactus damage. $(br2)They come in lots of different patterns and colors. You can tame and breed Camels with cacti.

pages.name: The O-Camel
pages.text: A cream camel with no markings.
